name: Arkady and Boris Rotenberg
description:
Today, on "Better Know an Oligarch!":

It's the brother combo of Arkady and Boris Rotenberg! Arkady is 70, Boris is 65, but they are both in top shape! Watch them skate with President Putin and other Russian ice hockey greats!

Watch them collect million after million as Russia builds gas pipelines! The world needs gas, doesn't it? And who better to supply it than Russia's premier pipeline company, owned by Arkady and Boris!

Watch them lavish their guests on the decks of their super-yachts and on the terraces of their mega-mansions! Watch them make love to women one quarter their age! Watch them grow richer and richer as their BFF makes the world tremble!

Go back in time and learn how Arkady and Boris met young Vladimir in a Leningrad judo club! Try to understand the brilliant machinations that installed these brainless brown-nosers as two of Russia's most powerful men!

Tomorrow, on "Better Know an Oligarch!":

May they all burn in hell.
